item.title: Trump considering 11 candidates for Fed chair, including David Zervos and Rick Rieder, sources say
item.description: The size of the Fed Chair candidate list and the process described suggest a decision is not imminent and could take a considerable amount of time.

item.title: Stocks making the biggest moves premarket: Cava, CoreWeave, Brinker, Hanesbrands and more
item.description: These are the stocks posting the largest moves in premarket trading.

item.title: Here’s the inflation breakdown for July 2025 — in one chart
item.description: The consumer price index rose 2.7% in July on an annual basis. There's some evidence tariffs are putting upward pressure on inflation, economists said...

item.description: These are the stocks posting the largest moves midday.

item.title: BlackRock’s Rick Rieder says CPI gives Fed justification for a half-point cut in September
item.description: "We expect the Fed to begin cutting rates in September, and it could be justified cutting the Funds rate by 50 basis points," Rick Rieder said.
